opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Verizon Communications Inc. v. Law Offices of Curtis v. Trinko, LLP

opinion:
538 U.S. 905

VERIZON COMMUNICATIONS INC.
v.
LAW OFFICES OF CURTIS V. TRINKO, LLP.

No. 02-682.

Supreme Court of United States.

March 10, 2003.

1

CERTIORARI TO THE UNITED STATES COURT OF APPEALS FOR THE SECOND CIRCUIT.

2

C. A. 2d Cir. Certiorari granted limited to the following question: "Did the Court of Appeals err in reversing the District Court's dismissal of respondent's antitrust claims?" Reported below: 305 F. 3d 89.
